notes.title: Edit the existing note.
notes.body: React Keep allows you to it edit the note whenever you want.

notes.title: Done with a note?
notes.body: Select the note then delete it by clicking on the trash icon.

notes.title: Everything in one place
notes.body: Any way you access Keep, all your notes stay in sync.

notes.title: Welcome to React Keep
notes.body: React Keep lets you quickly capture what is on your mind.
